original_text: I speak of what I have seen with my Father, and you do what you have heard from your father.”
korean_text: 나는 내 아버지에게서 본 것을 말하고 너희는 너희 아비에게서 들은 것을 행하느니라

sentences.original_text: I speak of what I have seen with my Father
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 내 아버지와 함께 본 것을 말합니다.

sentences.original_text: and you do what you have heard from your father
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 너희 아버지에게서 들은 것을 행합니다.
